entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51191
  • Unable to configure Data Protection via IOptionsMonitor<DataProtectionOptions> #51190
  • Android java client - RuntimeException: Invocation provides 1 argument(s) but target expects 0. #51189
  • Release the ReportViewer source code under a permissive license #51187
  • SignalR TS HttpConnection._resolveUrl fails if URL starts with "ws+unix:" (area-signalr) #51185
  • RequestDelegateGenerator creates incorrect code with default parameters for bool and CancellationToken in Lambda expressions (AOT) #51183
  • Blazor g11n/i18n support #51181
  • Logout fails in Blazor Web App with Identity #51180
  • User isn't logged in after registering a new user in a Blazor Web App with Identity #51179
  • Applying migrations using db error page fails for Blazor Web App with Identity #51178
  • The DailyBuilds page does not contain any links to Linux installers #51176

Closed

  • Compression under HTTPS with `dotnet watch` and `launchBrowser: true` breaks some HTML responses #32767
    .NET 8 Planning
  • hotReload fails with exception "Could not load type 'AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument" #44361
  • Net7 Blazor webassembly does not work with dotnet watch #45074
  • VS 2022 17.4.3 throw a exception at startup: The startup hook simple assembly name 'Watch.BrowserRefresh.dll' is invalid #45610
  • dotnet watch epic fail on Ubuntu #47122
  • dotnet watch - force use "Ctrl+R" to restart after static class change #48618
  • dotnet watch run with args break hot reload #51171
    8.0-rc2
  • Hot reload doesn't work with the empty Blazor Web App template #50931
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51182
  • Swap the order of the http/https launch profiles? #51159
  • Blazor Web App: AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized #51164
  • [Blazor] The default reconnect display does not appear after an enhanced navigation occurs #51083
    8.0.0
  • RazorComponentResult gives error: Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #51174
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51172

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `2dd1c13` #51186
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove MapIdentityApi's InfoResponse.Claims property #51177
    Servicing-consider, area-identity

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix default reconnect display not showing after enhanced navigation #51173
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Change Interactivity option text in Blazor web template #51160
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0.0
  • Rename "ASP.NET Core Web App" to "ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages)" #51157
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution
